Description:
The Great Starter!
Offering open plan living, this quality built home is ideal for the first home buyers & investors. Land size: 615 sqm approx.
* Comprising 4 spacious bedrooms all with BIR's, master bedroom features WIR & ensuite.
* Formal lounge room & dining room, open plan kitchen with quality appliances.
* Bright central bathroom & laundry, ducted heating, cooling.
* Double garage, low maintenance front & rear yards with enclosed alfresco.
* Within a close proximity to shops, schools & public transport.

Description:
Your Dream Home Awaits
This absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living overlooking parklands, close to schools, transport, Western Ring Road and freeway access.
This 39sq (approx) Porter Davis home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 4 lavish bedrooms, 2 stunning bathrooms as well a generous ensemble of living rooms sitting on a massive 740sqm (approx) of land.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with soaring high ceilings. A decadent master suite complete with walk-in robes, large spa ensuite and retreat which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
The property also comprises a generous study, dining area, casual living room and rumpus room. The gourmet kitchen includes top quality stainless steel appliances and granite bench tops.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of a massive alfresco area that has been extended for your enjoyment.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 3 cars, heating/cooling and extensive concreting contributes to this fine property
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale & Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 7 Carew Way Derrimut. An absolute credit to its current owners, this beautiful residence presents in pristine condition and ticks all the boxes in relation to the modern touches and design expected these days from buyers. A sensational step up kitchen fit for a chef (our vendor actually is a chef) features stone benches, glass and window splashback and 900mm appliances and overlooks the expansive dining and main living area that spills out to the gorgeous alfresco providing the indoor/outdoor living we all love. Sleeping quarters currently comprise 3 spacious bedrooms serviced by 2 lovely bathrooms and a large multipurpose room that can be used as a guest or 4th bedroom or utilise this space as a second living area or theatre room. Other features include a separate study or kids rumpus, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, oversize shower and double vanity ensuite, designer lighting, landscaped front and rear gardens, alarm, security cameras, double remote garage with internal access and so much more. Another quality Porter Davis home awaits one lucky purchaser.
Insights: 7 Carew Way, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Off street parking for 7 vehicles (4 undercover) and with rear roller door access from the double remote garage to the enormous rear yard (land 600sqm approx.) this property provides security for the caravan, boat or any other toys you may have, plenty of space for the kids to run around and a fantastic outdoor entertainment area with pergola to host the largest of family gatherings. Inside has been meticulously maintained and presents as new with a great design that features a large dual purpose room as you enter that can be used as a formal lounge / dining space or formal lounge /study area and a bright central kitchen that overlooks the meals and family room with feature gas fireplace. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with ensuite and WIR and 2 additional bedrooms of great size serviced by a lovely main bathroom. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, outdoor shed, additional bonus storage space in roof of garage, water tanks, carport ,extra wide driveway / crossover and landscaped front and rear yards comprising extensive concreting , water feature , outdoor lighting and beautiful gardens including vegetable patch and fruit trees for the keen gardener. All this combined with an absolutely prime location with the Derrimut Village , Deer Park train station, golf course, magnificent Balmoral Park, & schools all being just a short stroll from this home and with the bus stop practically at your doorstep a stress free lifestyle of total convenience awaits one lucky purchaser.
Insights: 18 Hammerwood Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
SIMPLY AN AMAZING MASTERPIECE
Located within minutes to Derrimut Village, Deer Park train station and amenities, this near new 45sq (Approx) single storey home, under 2 years old, is sure to tick all the boxes and end the search for a place called home. Comprising of five (5) spacious bedrooms, all complete with BIR, master with full en suite and walk-in robe, a multitude of living areas, open plan kitchen with adjoining formal dining, study, a sparking central bathroom and an enclosed alfresco, this home is designed to accommodate all family sizes and also to entertain. Features include; high ceilings with down lights throughout, stone bench tops, hardwood timber flooring, refrigerated heating and cooling, 32 solar panels, just to name a few, all set on a large allotment of 750m2(approx).
Arranging an appointment is a must! Call today to book a viewing of this magnificent home.

Description:
Affordable Opportunity
First impressions are lasting as is the lifetime of enjoyment offered by this lovely home. Perfect for the first home buyer, astute investor or downsizer the home offers a generously-proportioned layout flowing over a single level for effortless living which includes 3 bedrooms, master with a walk in robe and ensuite others with built ins, spacious open plan kitchen lounge & dining, central bathroom and a sizeable alfresco.

Description:
Stylish Home in Prime Location
Set in this quiet street, this residence delivers privacy and an exceptional indoor/outdoor family environment. The layout incorporates multiple living zones including front formal lounge, family and dining room which progresses to a beautiful hostess kitchen boasting quality appliances overlooking the great size alfresco area ideal for family and friends to entertain over the years. Upstairs there are spacious fitted bedrooms, master with W.I.R and en-suite and a family retreat and sparkling central bathroom. The long list of extras include: high ceiling, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, roller shutter windows throughout and a double car garage with remote control. This stylish home is set on a great size allotment 600 m2 approx. With quality finishes and a great location close to all amenities this home is a delight to inspect and even better to live in.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
With a modern cutting edge facade this brilliant Derrimut residence by renowned builder Urban Edge will most certainly impress. The home comprises a quality kitchen with dual ovens, 900mm cooktop and walk in pantry that overlooks the expansive dining area and leads out to the fantastic alfresco and great size rear yard. A large living area and another multipurpose space currently being utilised as a sitting area/study opens up a host of options as it is perfectly positioned for a kids rumpus play area being easily viewed from the kitchen and living area or make this space your family room and close off the current living room to convert into a 4th bedroom or theatre room. Sleeping quarters comprise an enormous master retreat with mirrored BIRs and gorgeous ensuite featuring upgraded fixtures and fittings and 2 additional bedrooms of good size serviced by a lovely main bathroom. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, security cameras, quality window furnishings, tinted windows, landscaped gardens featuring extensive artificial grass, double remote garage with internal access and exposed aggregate double driveway providing off street parking for multiple vehicles. Situated in a quiet location with no drive through traffic and all amenities including schools, shops, parkland and transport being literally just a few steps around the corner completes this perfect package known as 9 Appleby Loop Derrimut.
Insights: 9 Appleby Loop, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
Sale by Set Date 1/3/2016
Stylish, Modern Family Living
Welcome to a home that is a masterpiece of contemporary design and superior quality, with a beautifully landscaped backyard that provides an unrivalled family lifestyle opportunity within short walking distance to all amenities including; recreational facilities, parklands, public transport, shops, local schools and more. This magnificently proportioned home offers a stunning wide entrance that walks past a great sized study and multiple, spacious living areas that surround a quality, modern kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances, tiled splash-back, 900mm cooker and a massive stone bench-top which completes the open plan downstairs. Venture upstairs to a large retreat and four spacious bedrooms await, master with W.I.R and en-suite, the other three bedrooms consisting of B.I.Rs serviced by a sparkling central bathroom with spa.
To top it all off, the serene outdoor entertainment area, with decking and a mini golf course, is perfect to gather family or friends together on any occasion.
Extras include; ducted heating, split system air conditioners, ducted vacuum, alarm, drive through access with remote control garage, just to name a few. In one of the most sought after pockets of Derrimut, this home will not disappoint. Don't delay, book an inspection today!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Only through inspection will you truly appreciate the effort and love that has gone into this fantastic Metricon built residence. An absolute credit to its current owners this home exudes warmth and comprises 3 very large bedrooms with BIRs with the enormous master offering WIR, retreat area and lovely ensuite with oversize shower. The sensational kitchen with stone benches and quality stainless steel appliances overlooks the expansive dining and main living area that leads out to the low maintenance rear yard that features extensive concreting and artificial grass where many a celebration can be had. Completing the home is a quality main bathroom and separate lounge that can also be used as a study or easily converted into a 4th bedroom to suit any buyers particular requirements. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, porcelain tile flooring, upgraded window furnishings including plantation shutters, down lights, landscaped front and rear gardens, double remote garage with internal access and walking distance to the Derrimut Village, schools, parkland and transport. Being just over 3 years old the new purchaser can enjoy peace of mind and security in investment as there is still many years of builders warranty insurance remaining and a Metricon 10 year structural warranty attached to the property.
Insights: 70 Foleys Road, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
40 Sherrington Grange, Derrimut
A lovely, well-presented, low maintenance family home located in sought after Brimbank Gardens and close to all amenities and freeway access. Offering three generous bedrooms including a master with en-suite and remaining bedrooms feature built-in robes. A centrally located bathroom includes shower and bath. The excellent sized laundry has storage and access through to garage. Well-appointed kitchen with quality appliances includes stainless steel 600mm gas cook top, stainless steel oven and stainless steel dishwasher. The kitchen overlooks a light-filled, tiled living/dining area. Outdoors you will be greeted by low maintenance concreted areas and additional access to the garage. Features include: double lock up garage, security door, gas ducted heating and split system cooling in lounge/dining area all situated and on a 316m2 block approx. Don't delay, enquire today for an inspection.
Scott Perry

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Nestled behind beautiful gardens including multiple mature palm trees proudly stands this special double storey residence that provides luxury features and appointments with the added bonus of a huge allotment that will bring you back to the good old days where backyards provided privacy, peace and quiet and serenity. Be the envy of all your friends and relatives when entertaining by opening up the bi fold doors creating an enormous indoor /outdoor zone incorporating the quality kitchen that overlooks the dining and main living area with the magical decked outdoor entertainment space. The massive rear yard opens up a multitude of options for family buyers, as is let the kids run and play in the wide open expanses, enjoy years of resort style living and create the ultimate home by adding a pool or for those that are looking to profit the possibilities of subdivision ( STCA) and adding another dwelling to the rear should also be explored as there is a wide side access to the western boundary of the property. Completing the lower level is a laundry, powder room and a large multipurpose room that can be used as a guest or 4th Bedroom, formal lounge, theatre room, rumpus or study or utilised to run a business from home taking advantage of the great exposure you will get in this prime position near the entry to Derrimut and only a few steps from the magnificent golf course and all the suburbs amenities. Upstairs comprises 3 spacious bedrooms serviced by 2 lovely bathrooms and a large upstairs retreat. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling , high ceilings, high doors, decorative cornices, down lights, alarm, double remote garage with internal access and so much more. Your very own piece of paradise awaits.

Description:
Great Location!
Reliance Real Estate is proud to present this perfect 5 bedroom house in a perfect location with easy access to the freeway, schools, public transport and shopping centres.
This magnificent double story house, perfect for a growing family.
Large entry offering a formal lounge, downstairs with bedroom and powder room with shower, open plan kitchen with lots of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances, family room and meals area leading out to the stunning decked outdoor with alfresco.
Upstairs comprises 4 very spacious bedrooms with ensuite. Additional features include double remote garage, high ceilings, ducted heating and much more.
Contact Glenda or Safwat for further information!

Description:
Live Large, Live Luxuriously!
Commanding street presence and set on a huge allotment of 845m2, this beautiful family haven (51 squares) is completed from front to back & is the perfect home for a large family, tradies or developers with scope to build a second dwelling at the rear STCA.
Inviting living spaces exemplify this exceptional residence, with formal lounge, open living/ meals zone with picturesque views of the huge alfresco and expansive garden.
Adjoining the main living zone is the well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, guest bedroom serviced by full ensuite. Step out to the massive outdoor entertaining area, generously shaded by a large pergola and is a private & peaceful space to enjoy your morning coffee or to entertain family and friends.
A beautiful staircase leads you upstairs to discover the third living area, luxurious master with a huge suite, walk-in-robe and ensuite, whilst a further 3 double-sized bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a family bathroom with separate WC.
Appointed with ducted heating and air-conditioning, high ceilings, powder room, 3rd bathroom, long driveway, sensor alarm, double auto garage & and a huge 4 car garage at the rear.
Live moments from freeways, bus stop, schools, parks, Derrimut village shopping centre & Golf Course.
Auction Saturday 5th of December at 2.30pm
Contact Gioan Pham 0422 804 082 or Hayden Bonnici 0412 462 495
Insights: 2 Scotney Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
A Spacious Family Home in a Top Location
Absolutely enticing to all, this fantastic home is beautifully situated in one the best pockets of Derrimut. Behind the striking facade awaits a superb selection of formal and informal zones, highlighted by open-plan casual living and dining.
Features 4 bedrooms a comfortable main bedroom retreat with ensuite and walk -in wardrobe, a 2nd, 3rd & 4th serviced by a light filled central bathroom. Further features include; well appointed kitchen with stone benches, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down-lights throughout and double garage.
Located in one of Derrimut's most coveted locations, this outstanding residence is only 20 minutes to the CBD and has every modern day requirement at your disposal.
With size and space for all, close to all amenities with local shops, parklands, schools, public transport and the Western Ring Road only moments away, your new home in the booming suburb of Derrimut awaits. Call us now to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 18 Sherrington Grange, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.
